name: Cauldron Calamity
description:
Controls

WASD - move

Left click - shoot basic bullet

Right click - throw held item

esc key - reset level

 Game Idea

The idea of this game is to defend a cauldron from constantly spawning enemies. Find potions ingredients around the map and from enemies. Pick up these ingredients and throw them into the cauldron to make a potion. These potions can be picked up and thrown at the enemies for different effects.

Context

This was made in 12 hours of development time in a game jam with the game having to be based around the idea of "Cauldron"

Known bugs

Spawned in enemies can't lower the cauldrons health. May get fixed but I generally do not patch game jam projects after the time is up.
